metadata.title: CVE-2021-28690 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: x86: TSX Async Abort protections not restored after S3 This issue relatesto the TSX Async Abort speculative security vulnerability. Please seehttps://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-305.html for details. Mitigating TAAby disabling TSX (the default and preferred option) requires selecting anon-default setting in MSR_TSX_CTRL. This setting isn't restored after S3suspend.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
